title: Larry WIlmore | Trump's ABC Town Hall Was Filled with Lies: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the president participating in an ABC town hall with undecided voters last night where he lied as often as he breathed.

Larry Wilmore talks about launching his late-night show during a pandemic, reveals his favorite In Living Color sketch he wrote and discusses covering the upcoming election on his late-night show.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
